name: Sphereton
description:
Sphereton is fun platformer game where you play as this ball that you simply control with few keys.

  • 8 Levels, more to come.
  • Play in fps mode
  • Collect coins
  • Easy for anyone
Controls

Move and Camera keys are customizable.

ActionControlsMoveADSwitch CameraCPauseEscape
All sounds from: freesound.org

Thank you for playing. Any feedback is much appreciated, but remember that this is my first game i have ever released.

Have fun.
